column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I have a bias. The Philadelphia Museum of Art is not only my favorite art museum
column2: it's also my favorite place on the entire planet. That said
column3: I knew going to the Art Institute of Chicago that I was going to be judging harshly since it's arguably one of Philly's primary national rivals for best art museum. And I will say
column4: Chicago has got it going on.
